mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_home_law t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.ID id, t.LAW_TITLE lawTitle, t.LAW_DETAILS lawDetails, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_home_law t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA LIMIT #{rows} OFFSET #{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_home_law ( LAW_TITLE, LAW_DETAILS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{lawTitle}, #{lawDetails}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_home_law SET LAW_TITLE=#{lawTitle}, LAW_DETAILS=#{lawDetails}, UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE t_home_law SET DELETE_FLAG='0', UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
